TopicTitle: KSP black screen on Start up

Articles.Content:
So, I've been having crashes with my modded install. I decided to try a clean install. 

I backed up the gamedata folder, the saves folder, the ships folder and the screenshot folder. 

After that, I deleted the entire modded install folder. The entire KSP folder. 

Then I verified my Steam Install before copy it over to my modded installs folder. 

After that, I copied all the backups back into the modded folder. 

I launch the game... and nothing. It gives me a black screen, no sound, nothing. It just stays on the black screen forever.

I would really like some help with this, please.

KSP log: https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fi/1kzv2nlczpj0duob0f04p/KSP.log?rlkey=y7mrv3fkrjx6141iwtu32gmu3&dl=0

MM Logs: https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fo/49tttoqhi6gfeeu0un26j/h?rlkey=bo7947b8y8vnrj6t895t693r4&dl=0

Mods:
